message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm confident that this will prove to be a wise investment for you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is truly significant and I can't let it go for less than $1,150,000. I believe this revised offer represents a fair compromise.

I understand that the product has significant value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $950,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $1,025,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering our previous discussions.
